name: FadedScrollView
description: ScrollView component with fading edges effect

props.name: showStartFader
props.description: Show a fader at the start of the scroll

props.name: startFaderProps
props.description: Additional props for the start fader

props.name: showEndFader
props.description: Show a fader at the end of the scroll

props.name: endFaderProps
props.description: Additional props for the end fader

props.name: useGesture
props.description: Use the react-native-gesture-handler version, useful when using react-native-reanimated
